short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that plays audio that matches the theme of the scene that you are reading in the manga

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For anyone who is reading the one piece manga and wants to have a sound track backing it, you can click a genre and music will play.
